replies.bodyText: It is correct, but I agree that it unfortunately looks a little bit strange and could easily be seen as a coding error. I've changed it to adhere to the example that we also have in the Javadoc, which should make it clearer what is going on.

timeline.bodyText:
This looks wrong style wise, but if lint is ok w/ it, I am as well.
I'm not usually a fan of catch / system.out style patterns, so, is there anything more to say here?  If not, it's ok.
